Visit Page                Intro Text   The Graduate College at the University of Illinois at Chicago is dedicated to a simple idea: bringing together superb students with outstanding research faculty in a diverse and stimulating urban environment.         Graduate College Pride Points        8000   Graduate Students         90   Masters programs         60   Doctoral programs             Apply        Regular Link Tiles           Research at UIC  As Chicago’s only public research university, real-world problems are solved through innovation and discovery.             Life at UIC  Discover what it means to be part of the UIC community.             Support Resources  Academic, accessibility, and wellness resources. Higher Education News        2020-2021 Recipients for the Access to Excellence Fellowship  Tuesday, April 28, 2020  The goal of the Access to Excellence Fellowship is to increase the number of students from historically underrepresented groups in graduate education who enter careers as researchers and college faculty. Inspired by…          Why is Zoom so exhausting?  Friday, April 24, 2020  It’s admittedly difficult to know how much of the exhaustion many academics are feeling is about the way they’re communicating and how much is about what they’re living through. But there’s something inherently draining about video chats.        More...
